meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hilly.
meanings.sent1: The hillinesses of the landscape made it challenging to build roads.
meanings.sent2: The hillinesses of the region provided stunning views of the valleys below.
meanings.sent3: The hillinesses of the area caused the ball to roll in unexpected directions during the game.
meanings.sent4: Her paintings captured the essence of the hillinesses, with each brushstroke mimicking a different slope.
meanings.sent5: The hillinesses of the terrain were like waves frozen in time, creating a unique and picturesque setting.

meanings.definition: The presence of hills or inclines.
meanings.sent1: We enjoyed hiking through the hillinesses of the national park.
meanings.sent2: The hillinesses of the countryside added a sense of adventure to our road trip.
meanings.sent3: The hillinesses of the playground made it a favorite spot for children to play hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the shadows cast by the hillinesses grew longer, painting the landscape in shades of orange and purple.
meanings.sent5: The hillinesses of the terrain created a natural obstacle course for the runners, testing their endurance and strength.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a hilly terrain.
meanings.sent1: The hillinesses of the region attracted mountain bikers looking for a challenging ride.
meanings.sent2: Living in a place with such hillinesses required strong leg muscles to navigate the slopes.
meanings.sent3: The hillinesses of the golf course added an extra element of difficulty to the game.
meanings.sent4: The hillinesses of the landscape resembled a giant's footsteps, leaving deep impressions in the earth.
meanings.sent5: The hillinesses of the terrain created a sense of isolation, with each hill hiding a new surprise beyond its peak.
